item.description:
We are pleased to once again welcome Mick Quinn, founder of the Integral Heart Foundation and author of The Uncommon Path, for a discussion around service and activism through the Integral lens.  Mick will provide us with an update of his work in Guatemala through IHF, and we will then transition the discussion to how we can use the Integral model in the world. We will read an excerpt from The Uncommon Path and all engage in an intersubjective dialogue around the idea of Occupying Integral and how it can be in service to healing the world and evolving culture.  (Please note: This event is also a fundraiser and all proceeds will go to the Integral Heart Foundation.)

The Integral Heart Foundation works with the poorest families in Guatemala. Their mission is to bring the right people together to lift up humanity through education and sponsorship. We offer this event in the spirit of Karma Yoga.  Please consider a tax deductible donation to this wonderful organization, whether or not you are able to attend the event. Make a secure donation to the Integral Heart Foundation here, via Paypal.
item.name: Occupying Integral in Central America (with Mick Quinn)
